comment._content: This photo, along with another LOC photo, seems to have been taken near NYC's Madison Square Park, possibly from the Flatiron Building.

comment._content: Wilson was running for President against Taft in 1912, here is article about Wilson: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woodrow_Wilson

comment.author: 8668775@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Photography Paradiso, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The 1912 Olympic games were held in Stockholm, Sweden, from late June to late July. This event in New York City, on August 24, must have been a "welcome home" ceremony, for recognition of returning American athletes, and a celebration of their achievements.
